item.title: How do i become a mod?
item.dc:creator: @T3h_Hate T3h Hate
item.description:
@T3h_Hate wrote:

Check if they have forums thats the best thing you can do for yourself on most servers they will hand pick you
like 93dc said but if they do have forums and you are active on the game you have better chances.

Read full topic
